text: is a professional Go player. ==Biography== Yoshio became a professional in 1985.GoBase.org profile He was promoted to 8 dan in 2003. He reached 400 career wins in 2003. He has three pupils, Takei Takashi, Yasuo Sakamoto and Yuri Tanemurasa. He is the head of the Kansai branch of the Nihon Ki-in.Nihon Ki-in profile ==Promotion record== ==References== ==External links== * Nihon Ki-in profile Category:1969 births Category:Japanese Go players Category:Living people Category:People from Osaka
title: Yoshio Ueki
